name: The Texas SEO Company
description: Terrance has over 15 years of experience doing internet marketing sales and he provides valuable insight and data into the competition of our prospects.  He started Florida Sport Fishing Magazine 15 years ago and today it has flourished into it’s own magazine.  His Goal for The Texas SEO Company is to get Texas business owner the tools they need to know exactly what their internet business is doing for them at a glance.
